snippet.title: My Little Pony Pinball - Trailer I Zen Pinball Party - Apple Arcade
snippet.description:
It’s a Zen Pinball Party -- and everyone’s invited!

MY LITTLE PONY Pinball releases into Zen Pinball Party on Apple Arcade soon. 

Visit Twilight Sparkle and her friends as they begin preparations for the largest party Equestria has ever seen! Play everypony's mane mode to start the Wizard Mode, and lock balls into the Tree of Harmony for a spectacular 6-ball multiball!
